title: Sato2h1
author: Sato2h1
content: Hey Guys,I'm selling my Industry Pass for this years Miami Bitcoin Conference as I won't manage to visit Miami in May this year.As you might know, the conference takes place from 18-20. of May 2023.The Industry Pass allows you to also visit the first day of the conference and also some more exclusive stuff to do on the conference.To find out more about the conference and the ticket visit: https://b.tc/conference/#ticketsThe full price of the ticket is 1599,-$ at the moment of this post. The prices are increasing in some days.If you're interested in the ticket, we can surely agree on a price Leave a message or a DM so we can discuss further!
